name: Run n' Gun (River)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Use Grapple Hook

Space - Jump

Shift - Dash

INFO:

This game was made across 8 days for the 💥 Juice Jam 💥 You can play either in browser or download the game. 

To install on desktop, download the file "v3.zip", extract it and run the unity executable.

KNOWN ISSUES:

I plan on fixing these after the voting period of the jam ends to avoid having unfair advantage

Mouse sensitivity doesn't persist through levels and will reset to the default after each level.

One of the  backgrounds songs doesnt respond the volume controls due ot being mapped to the wrong audio mixer.

CREDITS:

Shotgun Sawed Off by Quaternius [CC0], via Poly Pizza

Music (In order of appearance):

Press Fuse - French Fuse

Target Fuse - French Fuse

Polymetric Juggling - DivKid
